experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Spire Global
workDescription: Built fully E2E product, using real-time, high-volume data to predict flight ETAs
Created connectivity between 2 services (Databricks and Kafka) by creating an AWS TGW (transit gateway) and routing table in corresponding VPCs to enable data access across B.U.’s
Designed and implemented a caching service in Scala to integrate an AI inference model for real-time ETA predictions, supporting a processing throughput of 160k records per minute

Built a streaming pipeline to ingest live data from Kafka into Databricks, using Avro for decoding and Spark to stream into Delta Lake, reducing latency from 24 hours to a few seconds, and enabled real-time ETAs
Automated infrastructure provisioning with Terraform to deploy and manage a Databricks workspace, improved management efficiency for 12 users, handling 5+ workloads
Built an ETL pipeline to extract over 5.5TB of model training Data from GCP BigQuery, apply optimizations, and load to Delta Lake for ML applications

experiences.title: Automation Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Carta
workDescription: Containerized test application using Docker to be deployed in personal teams' Kubernetes namespaces, to integrate testing with each unique product; used by 2 external B.U.'s
Optimized CircleCI workflow by adding a checkpoint mechanism in docker image generation, reduced development pipeline from 5mins to a couple of seconds, accelerating development cycles
Integrated linters with Github actions (Flake8, Black, MyPy) to achieve 100% style and type checks to keep consistency across codebases

experiences.title: Automation Engineer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Carta
workDescription: Deployed and maintained infrastructure for Automation Framework (using Jenkins), used by 10+ teams, ensuring reliability, better visibility, and efficiency of testing process.
Contributed to Python testing application in Pytest framework to achieve 100% test coverage for API service
Developed shell script as entry point for a Docker container, automating setup and service initialization.

experiences.title: Automation Developer Intern
experiences.subtitle: Fleet Complete
workDescription: Implemented page object design pattern to automate UI unit tests using Cypress framework, reducing manual test execution by 30%
Continuously logged bugs discovered in automated tests and pipeline to improve product quality, and increase efficiency of development process

experiences.title: IT Team Associate
experiences.subtitle: University of Waterloo
workDescription: Centralized TV display system using Python to display digital signage to students and faculty.
Created a laptop booking system using JavaScript in Google Apps environment that streamlined the booking process for 90+ employees.
Coordinated with tech team to ensure ongoing function of 200+ computers, providing technical support to colleagues and troubleshooting issues collaboratively.
